title: Wordpress Industrial Training/internship
description:
We are looking for passionate WordPress Developer to join our IT team! As a WordPress Developer at our company, you will be responsible for both back\\-end and front\\-end development, including creating WordPress themes and plugins.

SKILLS EXPERIENCE

* Good understanding of front\\-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery.
* Experience building user interfaces for websites and/or web applications.
* MySQL database programming (the WordPress default database).
* Having knowledge on Shopify is a plus.
* Experience designing and developing responsive design websites.
* Experience building user interfaces for websites and/or web applications.

Job Types: Fresher, Internship

Pay: ₹5,074\\.55 \\- ₹10,347\\.27 per month

Benefits:

* Paid sick time

Schedule:

* Night shift

Supplemental Pay:

* Overtime pay
* Quarterly bonus

Ability to commute/relocate:

* Mohali, Punjab: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)

Shift availability:

* Night Shift (Required)

Work Location: In person
